name: Acoustic Kitty
description:
Main

* The game is based a real project by the CIA during the cold war called "Acoustic Kitty". In the real world, the idea failed, but in the world of the game, it ended in success. Now the cat has a new mission: He must sneak into an old hotel with no windows, find all the spies and listen to them all.

*But there are some troubles. The cat is constantly hungry and during the mission you will need to feed the cat for the cat to obey orders. You should also avoid telephones, radios and televisions. These items cause interference in the cat's earphone, which leads to stress. With a high level of stress, the cat stops obeying orders.

* You, as an operator, will follow the cat using video surveillance cameras. You will hear all the commands that you give to the cat, and all the conversations of the red spies.

Control

The description of the control is in the game, but here I duplicate it.

W - Move cat forward;

S - Stop;  

A,D - Rotate to left, right; 

E - some action; 

<- and -> change active camera in toom.

Some number
  • Cat bowl: +40 food, -25 stress
  • Telephone: +20 stress, 80% Activation chance
  • Radio: +50 stress, 45% Activation chance
  • TV: +70 stress, 45% Activation chance
Other

In the main menu you can:

  •  Adjust sound
  • Set the settings for the next hotel. The main thing is not to forget to click on the "use these settings"
  • Settings are not saved when exiting.
  • The game cannot be saved.
